column1: Little Goat Diner////We knew we were going to eat a second dinner next door at Au Cheval
column2: so we decided to share 2 smaller dishes. Based on reviews and our waitress' recommendations
column3: we tried the goat chili cheese fries and the pork belly pancake. The chili cheese fries were nothing out of the ordinary. You couldn't tell the meat was goat and I felt that I could get the same flavor at any fast-food restaurant. The pancake was a savory mix of different Asian flavors. It reminded me of a Korean pancake (but not as good). I'm still not sure why everyone raves about it.
